sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.MultiElementSelectionUtil</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description/> <name>MultiElementSelectionUtil</name> <script><![CDATA[/** * This script include is called from ui_action(pa_widgets) and business rules (pa_widgets,pa_indicators) * This returns what should be the value of multiple_elements_view field of widget based on indicator * aggregate type and type of widget. * STRY50074235 */
var MultiElementSelectionUtil = Class.create(); MultiElementSelectionUtil.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, { getValueForMultipleElements: function () { var config = this.getParameter('sysparm_config'); return SNC.PAMultiElementUtil.getOptionsForMultipleElements(config); },
isMultiElementSupported : function () { var config = this.getParameter('sysparm_config'); return SNC.PAMultiElementUtil.isMultiElementSupportAggregation(config); }, type: 'MultiElementSelectionUtil' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-03-05 05:24:08</sys_created_on> <sys_id>3e3761e85f803300ed3926e6ee731381</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>81</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>MultiElementSelectionUtil</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Performance Analytics" source="com.snc.pa">97a305876da620100acb70b353433004</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3e3761e85f803300ed3926e6ee731381</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-08-26 09:57:30</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>785</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
